body.name: BPA-Free Buckle Booster - Seat Belt Receptacle Stabilizer Raises Your Buckle for Easy Reach - No More Fishing/Bruised Hands - Stand Buckle Upright, Fasten Seatbelt Easily (2Pack)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the SEAT BELT EXTENDER PROS Store

features: CHECK YOUR SEAT BELT BUCKLE BEFORE ORDERING: Please review the images that show where the Buckle Booster will fit and make sure your seat belt buckle is not too recessed. Also note that the inner dimensions are 1.93 inches x 1.06 inches, and the material stretches a bit. No matter what, we'll still help with your order, but reviewing in advance is always best.

NO MORE FRUSTRATION, JASON! - Do you get annoyed with buried seat belt buckles? It's a hassle digging receptacles from under the seat. Your solution is the Buckle Booster. It slips around your receptacle in seconds to ensure that your seat belt buckle doesn't get buried. Keeping your receptacle upright and accessible for future rides, this adult and kid-friendly tool makes buckling a breeze.

RAISES YOUR BUCKLE, THIS UPSTANDING FELLA - The trouble with buckling is not just inadequate space, it's also how far you have to reach for the buckle. The Buckle Booster elevates your seat belt receptacle so the metal tongue can click in smoothy and effortlessly. No more strain and struggle - buckle yourself and others quickly and without hassle!

PERFECT FOR ALL, Y'ALL :) - The BPA-free Buckle Booster allows you to buckle up with just one hand, whether you are in a hurry or have mobility challenges. Are you post-surgery, have arthritis or simply unable to spare a hand for buckling? The Buckle Booster lets you buckle yourself and others with one hand. Keeping the receptacle stable, you just need to click the metal tongue in and you're ready to go!

BUCKLE IN BOOSTER & CAR SEATS, BREATHE.. - Reaching from the side to buckle babies and kids can be frustrating due to the elusive, floppy buckles that get buried under seats. With three car or booster seats in the back, your buckling job is nearly impossible. With the Buckle Booster, made from safe materials, buckling loved ones in the back is easy! You can comfortably reach the receptacle, even between car and booster seats. Have one car seat? Reaching the stable, elevated buckle just got easy!

productInformation.name: Safety warning
productInformation.value: ‎Warning: This is not a safety device. Do not eat or chew on product. Installer must ensure that user and others maintain access to the seat belt release button at all times. Buckle Booster should never be used if it impacts the seat belt's functionality in any way. Seller disclaims all liability, including but not limited to any damages arising from the use of the product. Use only if physically required to fasten seat belt as legally required by law.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Clean with damp cloth or soap and water

productInformation.name: Additional product features
productInformation.value: ‎Portable, Universal, Reusable, BPA Free, No Installation Required, Just Slide Over Buckle

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster Seat Belt Receptacle Raiser Buckling babies and adults just got easy! With your new Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster, you'll be able to buckle yourself with one hand or buckle children in the back seat without struggle. The Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster raises back seat receptacles to make it easy to buckle yourself or your child in. Due to its clever design and superior materials, the Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster will improve your ability to buckle yourself and others. No more hassle and frustration buckling up in the back seat! It's also helpful if you are a caretaker for others, making car trips that much more manageable. It works great for the elderly and other passengers seeking independence, like someone who is post-surgery or injured passengers with limited range of motion.

1-Pack Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster 2-Pack Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster 3-Pack Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster 4-Pack Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster 3-Pack Lil' Hugger Buckle Booster 2-Pack Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster Quantity 1 2 3 4 3 2 Color Purple Purple Purple Purple Purple Yellow Stickers Included! Included! Included! Included! Included! Included! Phthalate Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ PVC Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Lead Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ BPA Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Style Pullover Pullover Pullover Pullover Wrap Around Pullover

Will the Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster Work For Me? Yes! If your seat belt receptacles sit above the level of the back seat bench, then the Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster is very likely to be a great fit in your car. Give it a try, and see if it solves your buckle accessibility challenges. If it doesn't, we're here to help. Yes! If your seat belt receptacle lives in a recessed cavity, but can be pulled up and out of the cavity, the Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster is very likely to be a great fit in your car. In fact, the Buckle Booster will help keep the receptacle from falling back into this cavity every time you unbuckle, adding struggle and strain to get at it again. If it doesn't fit, we're here to help. No! Not for tightly recessed buckles. If your back seat receptacle is in a recessed cavity and it has wiggle room, but there isn't enough room around the sides or it doesn't come out more than halfway from the cavity, the Buckle Booster will not work in your vehicle, we're sorry to say. No! Not for tightly recessed buckles If your back seat receptacle(s) sit deep in a recessed cavity, with the top of the receptacle flush with the level of the back seat bench, the Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster will not work in your vehicle, we're sorry to say. This is a very common design in Teslas, but it also appears in other vehicles.

Will My Recessed Receptacle Work With the Buckle Booster Please use the image to the right as a guide to understand if your recessed receptacle will work with the Buckle Booster. Some recessed receptacles have a spacious area in which to move, with room for the Buckle Booster to go around them within the recessed area and still get the top of the receptacle clear of the Buckle Booster. In these cases, the Buckle Booster should work. In other cases, the recessed receptacle is snug in the back seat bench with no room on any side for a Buckle Booster and no way to pull the receptacle out of the recessed groove. If this is the case, unfortunately, the Buckle Booster is not suitable for this location.

Installation The Buckle Booster usually works in all back seats, though there are some exceptions. It can sometimes be used in the front for bench seats. 1. Simply slide the Buckle Booster over the receptacle that you would like to raise 2. Ensure that it fits firmly at the base, allowing access to the (usually red) release button 3. Fasten the seat belt with ease If your receptacle is simply too tight to comfortably fit through the Long Neck Pullover as you move it to the base, buckle the seat belt in and use the strap as leverage to maneuver the Buckle Booster into place.

Materials: BPA-Free, PVC-Free, Phthalate Free, Lead Free We take safety seriously, so we worked hard to use the safest material when designing the Buckle Booster. Silicone and TPE material are used to make pacifiers, baby bottle parts, and food preparation items like spatulas. The denser version of this same material provides stability for your seat belt buckle and easy access for you! Don't get any ideas, though - you or your kids should not eat or chew on the Buckle Booster. The installer must assess safety.

The Booster Seat's Friend The Long Neck Pullover Buckle Booster is ideal next to your child's booster seat. It prevents you from having to reach all the way over your child to buckle them in. Two Booster Seats Together If you have two booster seats next to each other, or a booster seat and a car seat, the Buckle Booster raises up both receptacles between them, helping prevent buckle crunch (the nasty scraping of knuckles on booster seats). Comes With Fun Safety Stickers These stickers will provide some extra joy for your children while also reminding them about the importance of car safety. It's Often the Simple Things It's a remarkably simple solution, but it will make all the difference as you seek to buckle your kids into the back seat of the car. Buckle Booster beside a booster seat. Two Buckle Boosters between booster seats. Fun Stickers Buckle Booster beside a booster seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Es muy útil, pero solo le doy 3 estrellas porque para instalarlo da mucho trabajo, no es tan fácil como se ve en las fotos, por lo demás es súper útil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: I liked the item because I needed an extender and this helped to keep the belt in place so the extender would work properly. It is a bit bulky but it foes the job well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: Not sure if it’s my vehicle only but the buckle seems too long for this device to work. The buckle still flops to the side. If it was maybe an inch longer I think it would work as described. I’m still blindly searching for the buckle to slide the seatbelt into however now I have an extra area to try to push it in which is actually making it more difficult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars not worked for me
reviews.reviewText: not easy to insallnot easy to useeasily be pulled outsorry but useless to me
